name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-meetings-events-csharp
title: Realtime meeting events and meeting participant events
shortDescription: This C# sample demonstrates how a bot can receive real-time updates for meeting events and participant activities within Microsoft Teams.
longDescription: This sample application showcases how to utilize a bot in Microsoft Teams to capture real-time meeting and participant events, enhancing the interactivity of your meetings. It features capabilities such as adaptive cards, interaction with the app, and requires Microsoft 365 account permissions for setup.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing realtime meeting events and meeting participant events

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
